title: UniversalInventorySystem
description: UE5 Inventory System is a Blueprint-based solution with network replication, dynamic item management, and intuitive UI.
longDescription:
Documentation: link

Demo videos: YouTube, Bilibili

Play example: Google Drive 

Due to copyright reasons, the model resources in the project have been replaced with free models from EPIC Games, and the animations have been removed. However, the example Actor functionality has been retained.

If you need the demo combined with ALS in the video, you can purchase it and contact me afterward.

Citing resources:           

  • Stylized Character Kit: Casual 01 - Epic Games Store Link

Key Features

  • Fully Blueprint Implemented: All features implemented via Blueprints, no C++ required.
  • Network Replicated: Supports inventory synchronization and management for multiplayer online games.
  • Dynamic Inventory Management: Supports adding, removing, and moving items.
  • Multiple Item Types: Supports various item types such as weapons, consumables, quest items, etc.
  • UI Integration: Pre-built user interface for easy inventory display and operation.
  • Quick Slot Support: Allows players to quickly access and use items in the inventory.
  • Highly Extensible: Easy for developers to extend and customize features as needed.
  • Drag and Drop Functionality: Supports mouse drag and drop operations for easy inventory management.


The UE5 Inventory System is a comprehensive and flexible solution for Unreal Engine 5 projects, implemented entirely using Blueprints. This means no C++ coding is required, making it accessible and easy to use for developers of all levels.

Key features include network replication, ensuring seamless inventory synchronization in multiplayer games. The system supports dynamic inventory management, allowing for easy addition, removal, and movement of items. It accommodates various item types such as weapons, consumables, and quest items. 

The inventory system comes with pre-built UI components for intuitive inventory display and management, including quick slots for rapid item access. Its drag-and-drop functionality makes organizing items straightforward and efficient.

Designed with high extensibility in mind, developers can easily customize and expand the system to suit specific project needs. Pre-configured input support for keyboard and mouse ensures easy integration into any project. The system is compatible with both Windows and Mac development platforms.

In summary, the UE5 Inventory System offers a robust, user-friendly, and highly extensible inventory management solution for Unreal Engine 5 projects.
technicalDetails:
Number of Blueprints:

  • 1 Core Actor Component
  • 6 Core Blueprints
  • 4 Core Materials
  • 2 Material Instances
  • 1 Data Tables
  • 7 Core Structures
  • 6 Core Enums
  • 1 Function Libraries
  • 7 Core Interfaces
  • 1 Niagara
  • 6 Core Widgets

Controls

  • [E]: Pickup Item
  • [TAB]: Open Inventory
  • [G]: Drop Item (can also be dropped by dragging the slot off the inventory)
  • Hold [G]: Charge throw (hold to increase throw force, release to throw)
  • Left-Click and Drag: Move item (drag to drop or move to another slot)
  • Left-Click and Drag with Right-Click: Drop a single item (when dragging a stack, right-click to drop a single item)
  • Shift + Right-Click on an item: Quick Equip (quickly equip the item)
  • Right-Click on equipped item: Quick Unequip (quickly unequip the item)
  • [1-5]: Equip Item (by slot number)

Input Methods

  • Pre-configured support for:
  • Keyboard
  • Mouse

Network Replication

  • Yes: Supports network replication for multiplayer online games.

Supported Development Platforms

  • Windows: Yes
  • Mac: Yes
